医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现吃六种主要食物可以降低患心脏病的风险由麦克马斯特大学和汉密尔顿健康科学研究所的人口健康研究中心 (PHRI) 的研究人员领导的一项研究发现，六种主要食物的组合摄入不足与成人患心血管疾病 (CVD) 的风险较高有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Eating-six-key-foods-can-lower-a-persons-risk-of-heart-disease-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Eating-six-key-foods-can-lower-a-persons-risk-of-heart-disease-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6519758-dbc9-471e-b42c-883115eb5f4a Thu, 06 Jul 2023 22:48:35 -0400 Eating six key foods can lower a person's risk of heart disease, study finds
研究：健康饮食中可以包含或不包含未加工的红肉和全谷物根据一项在所有有人居住的大陆 80 个国家进行的研究，这项研究今天发表在欧洲心脏病学会期刊《欧洲心脏杂志》上，该研究表明，健康饮食中可以包含或不包含未加工的红肉和全谷物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Study-Unprocessed-red-meat-and-whole-grains-can-be-included-or-left-out-of-a-healthy-diet。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Study-Unprocessed-red-meat-and-whole-grains-can-be-included-or-left-out-of-a-healthy-diet。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9435cd7-d81e-46fa-808d-850bfe0f2569 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 22:43:19 -0400 Study: Unprocessed red meat and whole grains can be included or left out of a healthy diet
下颌骨的变化可能预示着女性未来身高的下降发表在开放获取期刊 BMJ Open 上的研究表明，中年时期下颌骨的结构变化可能预示着女性随后的身高下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Jawbone-changes-may-signal-future-height-loss-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Jawbone-changes-may-signal-future-height-loss-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a75d6a4a-ad8c-4753-9459-7365f7230ab0 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 22:39:00 -0400 Jawbone changes may signal future height loss in women
彭宁顿生物医学研究中心致力于对抗儿童肥胖在美国，五分之一的儿童患有肥胖症，甚至更多的儿童被认为超重。彭宁顿生物医学研究中心副教授、儿童肥胖与健康行为实验室主任阿曼达·斯塔亚诺博士认为，儿童肥胖是本世纪公共卫生问题的首要问题，因为肥胖儿童更容易患上肥胖症。心脏病、糖尿病、哮喘、睡眠问题和其他问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Pennington-Biomedical-Research-Center-works-to-combat-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Pennington-Biomedical-Research-Center-works-to-combat-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3850e329-4d4e-4b19-b365-d96573e77470 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 22:34:01 -0400 Pennington Biomedical Research Center works to combat childhood obesity
学校护士在减少儿童肥胖方面发挥着关键作用学校护士所做的不仅仅是包扎擦伤的膝盖和测量体温。罗格斯大学的一项研究发表在《儿科护理》杂志上，表明它们也可能在减少儿童肥胖方面发挥关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/School-nurses-play-key-role-in-reducing-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/School-nurses-play-key-role-in-reducing-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65ee818a-2604-4493-848a-4e5f136acc95 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 22:16:40 -0400 School nurses play key role in reducing childhood obesity
缺乏认识和培训导致子宫内膜异位症诊断延误回顾过去 20 年的定性研究，研究人员发现了一系列影响因素，包括：社会对月经疼痛的正常化；以及缺乏有关这种情况的医疗培训。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Lack-of-awareness-and-training-leads-to-delays-in-diagnosis-of-endometriosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Lack-of-awareness-and-training-leads-to-delays-in-diagnosis-of-endometriosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6c8dfae-27f6-4f6e-bcbb-cb37d134ea13 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 22:15:23 -0400 Lack of awareness and training leads to delays in diagnosis of endometriosis
FKBP5 缺乏与心房颤动有关心房颤动 (AFib) 是最常见的心律失常类型。当心脏跳动过快以致心脏上腔室颤动时，就会发生这种严重的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/FKBP5-deficiency-linked-to-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/FKBP5-deficiency-linked-to-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=477f047a-e023-4ad8-b2bf-02a1e8db8912 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 22:04:12 -0400 FKBP5 deficiency linked to atrial fibrillation
社会隔离是老年人吸烟的危险因素年老带来智慧和经验；然而，对于一些人来说，变老也意味着健康挑战、失去朋友和活动能力下降，从而导致社会孤立。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Social-isolation-a-risk-factor-for-smoking-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Social-isolation-a-risk-factor-for-smoking-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25d388c8-e363-4d85-8bff-98da4a96ad9b Thu, 06 Jul 2023 22:00:56 -0400 Social isolation a risk factor for smoking in older adults
健康饮食可降低成年儿童癌症幸存者的心血管疾病风险研究探讨了饮食模式对儿童癌症成年幸存者心血管疾病风险的影响，揭示了该人群饮食与长期健康结果之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Healthy-diet-shown-to-lower-cardiovian-disease-risk-in-adult-childhood-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Healthy-diet-shown-to-lower-cardiovian-disease-risk-in-adult-childhood-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0aed91f8-1997-46c9-94cd-299022190e7d Thu, 06 Jul 2023 22:00:00 -0400 Healthy diet shown to lower cardiovascular disease risk in adult childhood cancer survivors
研究表明糖含量标签最能有效阻止汽水消费，图形警告引发争论检查包装正面的警告标签，以评估其对减少含糖饮料消费的影响。该研究比较了 27 个带有不同信息的警告标签，为未来促进健康饮料选择的研究和政策方向提供信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Study-reveals-sugar-content-labels-most-efficient-in-discouring-soda-conspiration-graphic-warnings-spark-debate.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Study-reveals-sugar-content-labels-most- effective-in-discouring-soda-conspiration-graphic-warnings-spark-debate.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dce0a75e-5cd5-4c6e-887c-e7d6cb838e1f Thu, 06 Jul 2023 21:52:00 -0400 Study reveals sugar content labels most effective in discouraging soda consumption, graphic warnings spark debate
